thread.title: Council tax freeze blamed as thousands face jobs cuts
thread.title_full: Council tax freeze blamed as thousands face jobs cuts - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Council tax freeze blamed as thousands face jobs cuts
text:
11
Have your say ONE of Scotland’s largest local authorities has called for an end to the SNP’s flagship council tax freeze as budget cuts led to another bleak day for local government job losses.
Edinburgh City Council indicated that the freeze should be halted to relieve the pressure on local authorities as North Lanarkshire Council outlined proposals to axe more than 1,000 jobs.
Our assumption is that there will not be a council tax freeze otherwise that figure goes up Bill Cook Union leaders last night said the North Lanarkshire cuts were “devastating” for an area still reeling from loss of jobs resulting from the collapse of the Scottish steel industry.
